snippet: Even if Mitt Romney has quelled doubts about his toughness, he emerges from Florida carrying heavy new baggage.
abstract: News analysis; Mitt Romney's victory in the Florida Republican presidential primary shows worried Republicans his agile political street fighter side; even if he has quelled doubts about his toughness, he still emerges from Florida carrying heavy new baggage; rival Newt Gingrich's negative ads have softened Romney for the Democrats.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and ASHLEY PARKER

lead_paragraph: Even if Mitt Romney has quelled doubts about his toughness, he emerges from Florida carrying heavy new baggage.

headline.seo: Romney’s Negative Campaign in Florida Could Have Political Costs
headline.main: The Political Costs of a Nasty Fight
headline.print_headline: A Nasty Fight Carries Risks for the Winner
